instructions: Open Settings on your iPhone, then tap Notifications . In the Notifications screen, tap Mail . In the Mail screen, turn on the Allow Notifications toggle switch, then tap Thread Notifications . In the Thread Notifications screen, turn on the Allow Notifications toggle switch. The notifications options for email threads are the same as the ones for all notifications. Choose to see notifications on the Lock Screen and in the Notification Center . Choose Banners to have notifications show up temporarily or stay on the screen until you dismiss them. Choose Sounds to play a sound when an alert comes through. Choose Badges to put a notification on the Mail icon when you receive a reply. You'll receive alerts when you receive new emails in the thread according to the options you chose.
